Actor William Hurt spent his last few weeks in excruciating pain as he refused to take opiates and break his decades-long sobriety, a source close to the Oscar-winning actor has revealed.

articles.title: Escape to the Chateau's Dick and Angel Strawbridge bid emotional farewell to 'special' show - The Mirror
articles.description: Dick and Angel Strawbridge - best known for their TV show Escape to the Chateau - bid an emotional farewell to their live tour, after five weeks on the road with their kids
articles.content:
Escape to the Chateau's Dick and Angel Strawbridge have bid an emotional farewell to their live show.
